text: (And Unto Allah belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens) of creation (and whatsoever is in the earth) of created beings; they are all slaves of Allah, (that He may reward those who do evil) those ascribe partners to Allah (with that which they have done) in their state of idolatry, (and reward those who do good) those who believe in Allah's divine Oneness (with goodness) with the Garden.
